name: One Tricky Journey
description:
This is a game about Rova, a tiny hero that is about to finish his longest journey, but things won't be as easy as he thinks, or as regular. Avoid and shoot enemies and run through platforms in this tiny obviously regular platformer. Nothing weird is going on here, what do you mean? :)

CONTROLS

Use the "A" "S" keys to move, Double tap "W" to double jump, and use the mouse to aim and shoot enemies.

CREDITS

The game was made in the Godot engine by me Missmelher. The graphics were made in Aseprite, also by me. The sound effects were made with Bfxr and the music is from Fesliyanstudios.com
